#summary A list of stories to be completed during the semester.

= Stories by Build =

== Build 7: Apr. 13 - Apr. 22 ==

  === Gameplay ===
  # User hears footsteps, gunfire, etc. (all sound effects)
  # User can fight at least four different types of enemies
  # User can participate in a "boss battle"
  # User can play through several linked areas

== Build 6: Mar. 31 - Apr. 8 ==

  === Gameplay ===
  # User's enemies will create dynamic plans to combat the player
  # User's enemies will create dynamic squad-based plans to combat the player
  # User can either hear or see enemy agents communicating (either via sound or text)
  # User can hear some sound effects
  # User can view slides telling the story between areas

  === Level Editor ===
  # User can create overlay sprites for different layers of the map
  # User can load in different tilesets

== Build 5: Mar. 17 - Mar. 26 ==

  === Gameplay ===
  # User's character can crouch
  # User's character can attach to cover
  # User's character can throw grenades
  # User's character can reload
  # User can fight enemies which crouch
  # User can fight enemies which attach to cover
  # User can fight enemies which throw grenades
  # User can fight enemies which can reload
  # User's enemies move intelligently around obstacles without unnecessary wall-hugging
  # User's character can pickup and switch between pistol, machine gun, and shotgun
  # User can fire bullets at both high and low heights

  === Level Editor ===
  # User can link levels together with waypoints
